CustomField.formula: CASE(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c, "Low",IMAGE("/resource/OCE__ApolloIcons/png/flag-green.png", TEXT(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c)) + " " + TEXT(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c) + " (" + TEXT(OCE__ProcessRisk__c) + ")", "Moderate",IMAGE("/resource/OCE__ApolloIcons/png/flag-yellow.png", TEXT(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c)) + " " + TEXT(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c) + " (" + TEXT(OCE__ProcessRisk__c) + ")", "High",IMAGE("/resource/OCE__ApolloIcons/png/flag-red.png", TEXT(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c)) + " " + TEXT(OCE__ProcessRiskLevel__c) + " (" + TEXT(OCE__ProcessRisk__c) + ")", "")
CustomField.label: Process Risk Visualization
